image:"https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4b/La_Tour_Eiffel_vue_de_la_Tour_Saint-Jacques%2C_Paris_ao%C3%BBt_2014_%282%29.jpg/1200px-La_Tour_Eiffel_vue_de_la_Tour_Saint-Jacques%2C_Paris_ao%C3%BBt_2014_%282%29.jpg",isTarget:true};return donation;};export var getDatesCount=function getDatesCount(finishDate){var currentDate=new Date().getTime()/1000;var difference=0;if(currentDate<finishDate){difference=(finishDate-currentDate)/86400;}else{difference=0;}return Math.round(difference);};export var dateToString=function dateToString(date){return moment.unix(date).format("DD MMMM");};
